statements.select: SELECT T_MENU_MAP.MENU_MAP_ID, T_MENU.SYSTEM_ID, T_MENU.MENU_ID, T_MENU_MAP.GROUP_ID, T_MENU.CATEGORY_ID, T_MENU.NAME, T_MENU.PATH, T_MENU.SEQUENCE, T_MENU.SEPARATOR, ISNULL(T_MENU_MAP.IS_READ, 0) IS_READ, ISNULL(T_MENU_MAP.IS_WRITE, 0) IS_WRITE FROM T_MENU LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T_MENU_MAP.SYSTEM_ID, T_MENU_MAP.MENU_ID, T_MENU_MAP.MENU_MAP_ID, T_MENU_MAP.GROUP_ID, T_MENU_MAP.IS_READ, T_MENU_MAP.IS_WRITE FROM T_MENU_MAP WHERE T_MENU_MAP.SYSTEM_ID = #SystemId# AND T_MENU_MAP.GROUP_ID = #GroupId# ) T_MENU_MAP ON T_MENU.MENU_ID = T_MENU_MAP.MENU_ID AND T_MENU.SYSTEM_ID = T_MENU_MAP.SYSTEM_ID ORDER BY T_MENU.SEQUENCE ASC
SELECT MENU_MAP_ID, SYSTEM_ID, MENU_ID, GROUP_ID, IS_READ, IS_WRITE FROM T_MENU_MAP WHERE MENU_MAP_ID = #Id#
statements.update:
MERGE INTO T_MENU_MAP USING (SELECT 1 AS dual) as X ON (T_MENU_MAP.MENU_MAP_ID = #MenuMapId#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
IS_READ = #IsRead#
IS_WRITE = #IsWrite#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (MENU_MAP_ID, SYSTEM_ID, MENU_ID, GROUP_ID, IS_READ, IS_WRITE) VALUES (#MenuMapId#, #SystemId#, #MenuId#, #GroupId#, #IsRead#, #IsWrite#);
